article_text:
Richmond, KY (40475)

Today

Showers and a possible thunderstorm during the morning will give way to partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 84F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%..

Tonight

A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 66F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Special to The Register

og.description: On June 29, nine members from the Madison Central FFA chapter loaded a bus and headed to Hardinsburg, Ky., where they would attend the Kentucky Leadership Training center.
og.title: Building leaders in Hardinsburg Kentucky"
